## Container.getIdentifier() method

Get the identifier for a target class or object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getIdentifier(target: Function | object): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

target


</td><td>

Function \| object


</td><td>

The target class constructor function or object instance


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

The identifier string. For functions, returns the tagged metadata id or function name. For objects, returns the constructor name.
